metadata.title: CVE-2021-47442 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:NFC: digital: fix possible memory leak in digital_in_send_sdd_req()'skb' is allocated in digital_in_send_sdd_req(), but not free whendigital_in_send_cmd() failed, which will cause memory leak. Fix itby freeing 'skb' if digital_in_send_cmd() return failed.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
